Game Engines

Several graphically intense interactive application frameworks / game engines exist that target web technologies. The following are some we recommend with instructions for producing a Chrome App.

PlayCanvas

https://playcanvas.com/

PlayCanvas demo on Chrome Web Store: Swooop

"PlayCanvas is a visual development platform for 3D web content. Both the tools and the web apps you build are powered by HTML5. The entire software platform is web hosted so there's nothing to install and you can access your work from any device that runs one of the supported web browsers." - PlayCanvas User Manual

PlayCanvas exports content that requires a small amount of manual work to package into a Chrome App. See: PlayCanvas Packaged App Publishing Documentation.
